snippet.title: SAND - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1431300/Sand

SAND is a vast, open world PvP-PvE game where you explore the fallen planet of Sophie. Build gigantic Tramplers to conquer this hostile environment, filled with mystical anomalies, monuments, and other players. Find out what happened in this fallen world, once ruled by the Austro-Hungarian Empire.

Developed by team Hologryph in Lviv, Ukraine. Support Ukraine - https://u24.gov.ua/
